title: Spacious duplex with garage parking! Available 8/1
posting_body: This multi-level home includes wall to wall carpeting, skylights, and in-unit laundry.
Electric heat and central a/c via heat pumps which is quite efficient!
There is garage parking perfect for those winter months when you don't want to shovel!
Nestled on a quiet street in close to proximity to major roads, highway, shopping and restaurants.
Enjoy this spacious unit which has plenty of space to spread out.
Featuring large walk in closets and bright open spaces!
The house is non-smoking and no pets are allowed.
3 Months required to move in: First, Last, 1/2 month security, 1/2 month fee.
Good credit and references a must.
